pages.text: "You spin me right 'round baby$(br)Right 'round like a record baby$(br)Right 'round, 'round, 'round$(br2)Please don't copyright strike us."$(p)The Industrial Turbine is a multiblock structure that consumes $(l:chemicals/steam)Steam$(/l) to produce power and, optionally, water.$(p)Max size: 17x17x18 (l x w x h)

pages.title: Construction Notes
pages.text: $(li)The $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotors$(/l) must be in the center of the multiblock.$(li)The $(l:blocks/turbine/rotational_complex)Rotational Complex$(/l) must be placed directly on top of the highest $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotor$(/l).$(li)The layer with the $(l:blocks/turbine/rotational_complex)Rotation Complex$(/l) must be completely filled with $(l:misc_blocks/pressure_disperser)Pressure Dispersers$(/l) (with the exception of the 1 required $(l:blocks/turbine/rotational_complex)Rotation Complex$(/l)).

pages.title: Construction Notes
pages.text: $(li)The $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_vent)Turbine Vents$(/l) can be on the walls and roof of the multiblock as long as:$(li2)They are not part of the frame.$(li2)They are on or above the $(l:misc_blocks/pressure_disperser)Pressure Disperser$(/l) layer.$(li)The $(l:blocks/turbine/electromagnetic_coil)Electromagnetic Coils$(/l) must be adjacent to each other, and one of the $(li)$(l:blocks/turbine/electromagnetic_coil)Electromagnetic Coils$(/l) must be placed directly on top of the $(l:blocks/turbine/rotational_complex)Rotational Complex$(/l).

pages.title: Construction Notes
pages.text: $(li)$(l:blocks/turbine/saturating_condenser)Saturating Condenser$(/l) are optional. If you have $(l:blocks/turbine/saturating_condenser)Saturating Condenser$(/l) in your Industrial Turbine, the Industrial Turbine can condense the used up $(l:chemicals/steam)Steam$(/l) back into reusable water.$(li2)The optional $(l:blocks/turbine/saturating_condenser)Saturating Condenser$(/l) layers can be on the same layer of the $(l:blocks/turbine/electromagnetic_coil)Electromagnetic Coils$(/l), or on layers above said $(l:blocks/turbine/electromagnetic_coil)Electromagnetic Coils$(/l) layer.

pages.title: Construction Notes
pages.text: $(li2)If you do decide to add $(l:blocks/turbine/saturating_condenser)Saturating Condenser$(/l), water will be auto-ejected via any $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_vent)Turbine Vents$(/l). $(li)Each $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotor$(/l) can support 2 $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_blade)Turbine Blades$(/l).$(li)Each $(l:blocks/turbine/electromagnetic_coil)Electromagnetic Coil$(/l) can support 2 $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotors$(/l) (4 $(l:items/turbine_blade)Turbine Blades$(/l)).

pages.title: Construction Notes
pages.text: .$(li)The Industrial Turbine must have a square base between 5 to 17 blocks wide. The length and width must also be odd, ex. 5x5 or 7x7. You cannot have one that is 6x7 or 8x8. Its height cannot exceed 18 blocks and 2 x TurbineWidth - 1

pages.title: Construction Notes
pages.text: $(li)It is not necessary to make sure every $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotor$(/l) have 2 $(l:items/turbine_blade)Turbine Blades$(/l). An Industrial Turbine can still form if one of its $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotor$(/l) is missing one or both $(l:items/turbine_blade)Turbine Blades$(/l). Of course, it's probably better if you do add the 2 $(l:items/turbine_blade)Turbine Blades$(/l) in to increase power production.

pages.title: Construction Notes
pages.text: $(li)Steam Capacity (mB) = TurbineWidth² × #ofTurbineRotors x 64,000$(li)Energy Production (J/t) = SteamFlowRate(mB/t) × #ofTurbineBlades × 2.5/7$(li)Energy Storage (J) = TurbineWidth² × TurbineHeight × 16,000,000

pages.title: Construction Notes
pages.text: $(li)Max Flowrate is determined by whichever is less:$(li2)MaxFlow (mB/t) = TurbineWidth² × #ofTurbineRotors × #ofPressureDispersers × 1,280$(li2)MaxFlow (mB/t) = #ofTurbineVents × 32,000$(li)WaterOutput (mB/t) = #ofSaturationCondensers × 64,000

pages.title: Multiblock
pages.text: Keep in mind that the book won't be able to display the $(l:items/turbine_blade)Turbine Blades$(/l) on the $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotor$(/l). You have to do that yourself by pressing $(k:use) on any $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotors$(/l) with the $(l:items/turbine_blade)Turbine Blades$(/l) equipped in your hands.
A minimal 5x5x9 Industrial Turbine with 8 $(l:items/turbine_blade)Turbine Blades$(/l) and no $(l:blocks/turbine/saturating_condenser)Saturating Condensers$(/l).
A 11x11x18 Industrial Turbine with 28 $(l:items/turbine_blade)Turbine Blades$(/l) and $(l:blocks/turbine/saturating_condenser)Saturating Condensers$(/l).
